Author: averybluebitch
Text: I think OP meant to say shouldnt :0

Author: ALittleBitChowderNow
Text: "It is triggering for some of us, of course... but they should delete the app."  Isn't that exactly what the article is advocating?  It's saying experts are warning vulnerable people with EDs or with disordered eating patterns to avoid it, not to shut the apps down completely.  Also, OP is welcome to their opinion, but I'd like to say no hate to our "obese" (I hate this word) brothers and sisters:  EDs come in all shapes and sizes.
